Bibliography

Bonds, Mark Evan. 2009. A History of Music in Western Culture, 3rd ed. Upper Saddle River, NJ: Prentice Hall.

Brewer, Carol A. and Diane Smith, eds. 2009. Vision and Change in Undergraduate Biology Education: A Call to Arms. Report organized jointly by the American Association for the Advancement of Science and the National Science Foundation.

Fink, Dee. 2014. “A Self-Directed Guide to Designing Courses for Significant Learning.” accessed August 1, 2014.

———. 2003. Creating Significant Learning Experiences: An Integrated Approach to Designing College Courses. San Francisco: Jossey-Bass.

  Hanslick, Eduard. 1854. The Beautiful in Music.

Kain, Patricia. 1998. “How to Do a Close Reading". Accessed August 1, 2014.

Liszt, Franz. 1855. “Berlioz and His Harold Symphony”.

Mendelssohn, Felix. 1842. “Letter to Marc-André Souchay” (15 October 1842).

Morrison, Charles D. 2009. “Music Listening as Music Making.” Journal of Aesthetic Education 43, no. 1: 77–91.
